name: Moneiva
description: Moneiva automates communication in Logistics and Supply Chain using AI-powered voice, email, and text agents. We reduce manual, repetitive tasks that cost teams time and money--every call costs $3.50, even when no one answers. Our deep logistics workflows drive 150%+ productivity gains and reduce communication costs by two-thirds.
